items.description: The list of users extended with their assigned roles.

v1ListUsersWithRolesResponse.description: ListUsersWithRolesResponse is the response from the ListUsersWithRoles function.

v1Permission.description: A Permission represents a permission in the Qdrant cloud.

id.description:
Unique identifier for the role (in GUID format).
This is a read-only field and will be available after a role is created.

createdAt.description:
The timestamp when the role was created.
This is a read-only field and will be available after a role is created.

lastModifiedAt.description:
The timestamp when the role was last updated.
This is a read-only field and will be available after a role is created.

accountId.description:
The identifier of the account (in GUID format).
This is a required field.

name.description:
The name of the role.
Name can only contain letters, numbers, spaces, underscores and dashes.

description.description: The human readable description of this role.

permissions.description: The permissions associated with this role.

subType.description:
The sub-type of the system role.
This field is set for system role only.

v1Role.description: A Role represents a role in the Qdrant cloud.

v1RoleType.description:
- ROLE_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: The role type is unspecified.
 - ROLE_TYPE_SYSTEM: The role type is system.
Note: system roles cannot be changed (create/update/delete).
 - ROLE_TYPE_CUSTOM: The role type is custom defined.
v1RoleType.title: RoleType specified the type of the role

v1SystemRoleSubType.description:
- SYSTEM_ROLE_SUB_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: The system role sub-type is unspecified.
 - SYSTEM_ROLE_SUB_TYPE_OWNER: The system role sub-type is owner.
 - SYSTEM_ROLE_SUB_TYPE_ADMIN: The system role sub-type is admin.
 - SYSTEM_ROLE_SUB_TYPE_BASE: The system role sub-type is base.
v1SystemRoleSubType.title: SystemRoleSubType specified the sub-type of the system role

id.description:
Unique identifier for the user (in GUID format).
This is a read-only field and will be available after the user is created.

createdAt.description:
The timestamp when the user was created.
This is a read-only field and will be available after the user is created.

lastModifiedAt.description:
The timestamp when the user was last updated.
This is a read-only field and will be available after the user is created.

email.description:
The email address of the user.
This is a read-only field.

status.description:
The status of the user.
This is a read-only field.

defaultAccountId.description:
The default account ID of the user (in GUID format).
You should be member of the account when updating.

v1User.description: A User represents a user in the Qdrant cloud.

v1UserStatus.description:
UserStatus defines the possible statuses of a user.

 - USER_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED: Default, unspecified status.
 - USER_STATUS_ACTIVE: The user account is active and can be used.
 - USER_STATUS_BLOCKED: The user account is blocked and cannot be used.
 - USER_STATUS_DELETED: The user account has been marked for deletion or is deleted.

roles.description:
The roles assigned to this user.
If the user has no roles assigned, this list will be empty.

v1UserWithRoles.description: UserWithRoles represents a user along with their assigned roles.
